Translations.Text: Acêal n temdinin i inuqmen lameô n Mass nnsent akked imazanen iS! Nêuseb itent leêsab uqsiê. Nâaqeb itent s uâaqeb issexven
Jeôôbent lwexda igiten nnsent. D lexsaôa ay d iooa lameô nnsent
Öebbi Ihegga yasen aâaqeb uqsiê. Ëezzbet i Öebbi a yuâqilen iumnen! Ni$ Öebbi Issers awen d asmekti

Amazan i wen immalen issekniyen n Öebbi iberrzen, iwakken ad Issuffe$, si tillas ar tafat, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Wid iumnen s Öebbi, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Issekcem ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkôen i lebda. Ni$ Öebbi Igerrez asen ôôeéq
Öebbi i Ixelqen ûa igenwan, akked tmurt am nitni. Lameô iprusu garasen, iwakken a ppeéôem ar Öebbi Izmer i yal cci, u Öebbi Izzi i yal cci s tmusni
